markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Silent Step](/Feats.aspx?ID=2326) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 19 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You vanish with silent treads. You Step, then [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63). You still need to meet the requirements to Hide or Sneak, as normal.
name: Silent Step
